# This file is managed by Puppet. Do not edit manually.
# cqlshrc configuration file for Cassandra 4.0+

[authentication]
credentials = ~/.cassandra/credentials

[connection]
hostname = <%= @listen_address %>
port = <%= @native_transport_port %>

<% if @ssl_enabled %>
[ssl]
certfile =  <%= "#{@target_dir}/etc/keystore.pem" %>
version = SSLv23
validate = false
<% end %>
